title: My Singing Monsters: Guide & Tips for Breeding Rare Drumpler

steps.title: Obtain some parent monsters.
steps.content: Obtain some parent monsters. To get a Rare Drumpler, you must breed together a monster with the Earth element and a monster with the Cold element. There's currently only one combination to get a Drumpler (if you don't already have a Drumpler): Noggin and Mammott . [1] X Research source

steps.title: Wait for an availability window.
steps.content: Wait for an availability window. Rare Monsters can only be bred during certain windows, and Rare Drumpler is particularly likely to appear during seasonal events. [2] X Research source Watch for the following rare monster availability windows [3] X Research source : Rares available on Air Island (due to the locations of the two parent monsters) Natural rares available EArth or Cold rares available Rare Drumpler available

steps.title: Level the parents to level 4.
steps.content: Level the parents to level 4. Monsters must be at least level 4 to breed, so while you wait for a breeding window for Rare Drumpler, obtain and level up the parent monsters. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Upgrade your Breeding Structures, if you wish.
steps.content: Upgrade your Breeding Structures, if you wish. While not necessary, you can upgrade your Breeding Structures to reduce breeding times by 25%. You can upgrade your structure by spending 25 diamonds . You can also add Wishing Torches around your Breeding Structure to help increase the odds of a rare monster being bred. [5] X Research source Wishing Torches can be lit for 24 hours by paying 2 diamonds or be lit permanently by paying 100 diamonds.

steps.title: Breed the parent monsters when a window opens.
steps.content: Breed the parent monsters when a window opens. When a window opens that will allow you to breed a Rare Drumpler, breed your parent monsters. Rare Drumpler's egg is furry and red with a fork and a spoon sticking out of it. [6] X Research source If you don't want to spend time breeding a Rare Drumpler or you're not having any luck, you can buy Rare Drumpler from the StarShop when it's available for 1,500 Starpower.

steps.title: Wait for your Rare Drumpler to hatch.
steps.content: Wait for your Rare Drumpler to hatch. If you get a Rare Drumpler egg, it will hatch in 1 hour, 7 minutes, and 30 seconds. If you have an enhanced Breeding Structure, the egg will hatch in 1 hour and 45 seconds.
